ygData.subject: Re: Geez!
ygData.msgSnippet: How do you know Josh? Are you one of Verant s game designers, planners, programmers, or developers?  Are you related to any of them and they have told you this
ygData.messageBody:
How do you know Josh? Are you one of Verant's game designers, planners,
programmers, or developers? Are you related to any of them and they have told
you this is a fact? Or are you as ignorant as the rest of us and just going by
what someone told you?
There are enough rumors and disinformation about the 3rd book, collapsible
fishing pole, and fireworks going around that I wonder if anyone on any server
really has solid information. Until I recieve some word by an Everquest
programmer or developer I'm keeping my mind open.
Don't count any information you have been told by the guides or GM's as
factual. None of them created this game.

Joshua Bednarz wrote:

> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>
> What will it take to get it through to you guys? There is NO damn third
> book, ANY formulas for items that have been figured out how to be made, if
> any at all were figured out by trial and error. There is absolutely NO BOOK!
> NONE not -ANYWHERE- in the game! When there IS something will be said about
> it in the patch. Until then , just work on raising your tinkering skill,
> thats all I can say, doing anything else about tinkering, like trying to
> find a non-existant book, or trying to figure out a formula with next to
> nothing odds is just a TOTAL 100% waste of time!
>
>
